message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $125 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
